page.title: 17CUSTOMS
page.content: During the week all Secondary school children wear school uniform as below. Garments should be plain &conventional & no jewellery. {BOYS:}Grey trousers,pale blue or grey shirt,school tie, blue or grey socks, plain navy blue jumper OR black blazer. {GIRLS:}Plain grey skirt or pinafore dress or grey trousers, plain pale blue blouse (tee shirt in summer), plain navy blue jumper or cardigan, plain socks or tights. For{leisure}children of both sexes tend to dress casually with denim jackets and jeans being most popular. Hair is often worn long by both sexes and may be multi-coloured and/or partially shaven. Fashionable clothes often have a crumpled look and teenagers of both sexes wear make-up following the example of many popstars
